name: 蕭郁達
objective:
本課程以化工程序中所包含的製程如蒸餾、熱交換器、攪拌、泵、機械分離等，由質量、能量及動量均衡開始講述，然後探討程序設計時使用的流程圖及其符號、成本估算、管線配置、流體輸送、化工單元規格設計等。
Application of chemical engineering science techniques to design of chemical processes. Comprehensive problems are assigned which include heat, material and economic balances, unit operations and processes, kinetics and thermodynamics.
The major responsibility is placed on individuals or small groups for the optimum design and selection of equipment, and for the calculations of required sizes, plant layout, and cost analyses.
schedule:
Week 1: Introduction to process design / 程序設計簡介
Week 2: Process flowsheets / 程序流程圖
Week 3-4: Process synthesis / 程序合成
Week 5: Process economics / 程序經濟學
Week 6-7: Heat integration and optimization / 熱整合與最適化
Week 8: Midterm Exam / 期中考
Week 9-10: Process simulation tutorial / 程序模擬教學
Week 11-15: Process simulation workshop / 程序模擬實作
Week 16-18: Final report / 期末報告
scorePolicy:
Participation / 出席 10%
Midterm Exam / 期中考 30%
Final Report / 期末報告 60%
課程對應SDGs指標: SDG1：消除貧窮（No Poverty）SDG4：優質教育（Quality Education）SDG7：可負擔的潔淨能源（Affordable and Clean Energy）SDG9：產業創新與基礎設施（Industry, Innovation and Infrastructure）SDG12：負責任的消費與生產（Responsible Consumption and Production）SDG17：夥伴關係（Partnerships for the Goals）
